nodes.label: Draw reversible and irreversible changes (ice melting vs. egg cooking)
Panel 1: Solid ice with arrow to melted water; arrow back to solid ice
Panel 2: Raw egg with arrow to cooked egg; 'cannot be reversed' label
Accurately shows reversible change - ice melting and refreezing
Correct depiction of irreversible change - raw to cooked egg
Label usage reflects understanding of reversible and irreversible changes
Calls water state 'melted ice' instead of 'melted water'
Clarify terminology: Use 'melted water' instead of 'melted ice'
